nodes.text: Oasis Northeast was a small body of water located near the Krayt Graveyard on the desert world of Tatooine.

Oasis Northeast was one of four bodies of water on the planet Tatooine in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011. The other three were the Imperial Oasis, the South Oasis, and the Oasis East.

Unlike the other oases in the game, the name of Oasis Northeast could not be identified using the in-game search feature. However, the Star Wars Galaxies TRE files listed the oasis as Oasis Northeast.
